comments.content: Hi, i saw this font but i don´t know it. Please help me to know it´s name. Thanks a lot.
Thanks but the letter "S" is different.

Tangent and Plan are a bit closer, but still no cigar:

[http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/artytype/tangent/](http://web.archive.org/web/20140822095113/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/artytype/tangent/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/artytype/tangent/")  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/characters/plan/](http://web.archive.org/web/20140822095113/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/characters/plan/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/characters/plan/")

You can take the /s of **[Parallello](http://web.archive.org/web/20140822095113/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Dafont-2&ffam=Parallello%20-%20Regular&fid=53f92066a00cc640777d8bd9c3c16dcf&fsize=60&text=sentinel&fit=1)** free font by Espen Morten Kvalheim and the rest letters from Dekers
That does it Fivos, good find.
